name: Herbal Bar Soap
description: A bar soap with a mild, soothing aroma featuring an Herbal olfactive family. Top Notes of eucalyptus provide an invigorating opening, complemented by Middle Notes of aromatic herbs, creating a calming and fresh heart. Base Notes of sandalwood add warmth and depth, ensuring a lingering essence that is comforting and grounding.
